behaviors.name: spawn_priority_filler
behaviors.description: Prioritizes filling empty spawns with available worker energy

behaviors.name: aggressive_spawn_filler
behaviors.description: Aggressively prioritizes keeping ALL spawns at maximum energy capacity

behaviors.name: critical_spawn_filler
behaviors.description: Urgently fills spawns below 100 energy with extreme priority

behaviors.name: ultra_spawn_filler
behaviors.description: Ultra-aggressive spawn filling that overrides all other worker tasks when any spawn is below 900 energy

behaviors.name: maximum_spawn_saturation
behaviors.description: Ensures all spawns are kept at maximum energy capacity at all times, prioritizing empty spawns

behaviors.name: simple_spawn_guardian
behaviors.description: Maintains spawns at 80%+ capacity without obsessive behavior. Allows workers freedom for other tasks.

behaviors.name: critical_spawn_fill
behaviors.description: Critical spawn filler: routes ALL available workers to priority fill spawns below 500 energy, especially spawn 6 (0 energy). Overrides normal harvest pattern.
